transcript: most people don't understand how much actual effort it takes to make something exceptional it's not about doing your best it's about doing what's required whenever I don't want to do something this is the actual phrase that comes in my head I will do what's required I look at some of the old presentations that I would make for my company and I'm like embarrassed I remember thinking when I looked at it this is exceptional at the time that was probably the best you could do that's where the [Â __Â ] disconnect happens bro you think because it's the best that you did that it's [Â __Â ] great but in reality the market says nah it's not as good as everybody else's [Â __Â ] everything's not as good as you think it is you might have given it your best but you didn't do what was required
